SkinPreparation: The skin was shaved, abrased and cleansed with 70 percent ethyl alcohol

EMGPlacementScheme.InvasiveEMG: A guiding filament inserted into a 25-gauge needle was used to place the thin-film structure in the muscle. Afterwards, the needle is withdrawn, leaving only the thin-film array within the muscle.

EMGReference: Wet reference band placed at the ankle of the same leg

Grid2.ThinFilmStructureGeometry: U-shaped structure with a length of 70 mm, widths of 0.65 mm (electrode filament) and 0.15 mm (guiding filament) and a thickness of 0.015 mm
